name: We're a Dragon
description:
In a faraway castle in a faraway kingdom, there lives a well-feared two-headed dragon named Dyranok. Those who have seen it know both how fearsome it is and how intensely its heads argue with each other.

Nevertheless, both heads know that they must defend their horde of riches from greedy adventurers and monsters, and even in their quarrel they'll team up to protect what belongs to them.

This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together."

Developed by:

  • Diane Sparks - Programming, sound, design
  • Rami Shreim - Art, design
  • Ali Abdul Rahman - Music
